item.title: Kent House Road a few yards south of, 4th September
item.description:

item.title: Thesiger Road next to Kent House Road junc, 4th September
item.description:

item.title: Further to https://fix.bromley.gov.uk/report/8063043 this, 4th September

item.title: 7 street lights not working, 4th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 282, Bexley Road, Avery Hill, London
